attributes.title: READ TERMS AND CONDITIONS!!! russians taking my info!!!
attributes.review: i’d like to preface this by saying that i think apple is colluding with trump because they won’t let my post my review. i posted one and it disappeared. i think that’s rly suspicious in itself, but it gets worse once you actually learn about the app. to start, this app took hours to download. and i mean hours!! i have a very new phone and it has all the new updates and plenty of storage, so this rly shouldn’t be a problem. however, i ended up staying up all night waiting for it to install and eventually fell asleep waiting. when i woke up, it still wasn’t done! if that wasn’t bad enough, when i finally did get it to download, it wouldn’t let me sign in. there must have been an issue with creating a new account, but it simply wouldn’t function at all. i have a tech friend so i called him and he said that he would see if he could hook me up to his computer and fix it, and his computer died halfway through but i guess it did the trick because i was able to create an account. unfortunately, the good news didn’t last very long. the app continued to crash any time i clicked on anything, and sometimes my entire phone would shut down with it. it was INCREDIBLY annoying. i thought all of this was a little suspicious, so i decided to read the terms and conditions. and i’m SO glad i did. it says very clearly in there that this app is allowed to not only collect data, view and save photos and videos from your camera roll, see your location, download your private messages, and access any paypal/cashapp that you might have linked to your phone, BUT they’re also SELLING this information to the russian government!! to make matters worse, the terms also detail how the app can work in the background to record audio and video from your phone WITHOUT consent or even alerting you. not to mention, it can also link to your social medias. idk if anyone else experienced this but i actually had some weird tweets sent out from my account that i didn’t write that were supporting trump’s reelection. i don’t know if this is some bug or virus from the app or if the app allowed some hacker into my twitter account, but i do know that this app is now stealing all my personal information and selling it to russia and i can’t even open the app. apple, this is a HUGE problem that your staff needs to address IMMEDIATELY. if you don’t take remove this app from the app store, i’m almost certain that you’re taking part in this whole corrupt exploitation of your users, especially because you have been deleting reviews. to anyone reading this!!! do NOT download this app! i wish i would delete it but it isn’t even letting me do that. i’m afraid that it will start taking money from my account or that russia might gain something from the information collected from my device. do NOT let yourself be a victim to this CRIME. please everyone, stay safe.

attributes.title: terrible
